sys_hub_flow.name: Sch meetup >21 day

logic_definition.display_value: Wait for a duration of time

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi Trigger➛Meetup event Record➛Created by,

I saw that you have an upcoming Meetup scheduled for Trigger➛Meetup event Record➛Date, which is very exciting! Would you like us to send out a promotional email to the developers in your community in order to create buzz for your event? In order to this, we need the finalized agenda to promote.

Please let me know when you decide upon an agenda, and then I will send you a draft of the email. Thank you for your efforts as an organizer!

Best, 

1➛Group Record➛Default assignee➛Name

1➛Group Record➛Default assignee➛Title

servicenow
